contents: Article 21 (Total Calculation) ① Costs and profits must be calculated based on the total amount, and all or part of them must not be excluded from the profit and loss calculation by directly offsetting cost items and revenue items. Revised August 26, 2021, ② In principle, assets, liabilities and capital are recorded in total amount, and all or part of them should not be excluded from the statement of financial position by offsetting asset items with liabilities or capital items. Revised 2021. 8. 26.
